title: Why am i bronze hahahhahahaahahha this game is so shit
body:
People in bronze can't play the game, its depressing when i think I'm carrying a game when the top laner has been fed about 20 kills and comes out of no where and one shots me, top laners don't know how to build tank and gragas jungle doesn't build tank, like it was bad enough i can't make it out cause of people like this, they fed complain about jg and then afk till 20 leaving no chance of us winning the game... 

if anyone is willing to spend time to help me out of this crap please by all means message me

replies.body: hey dude the way i got out of bronze and probably the easiest and quickest way is by taking your mums credit card and calling up xiaoweixiao and getting one of 'em cheeky elo boosts, doesnt hurt no one. ;-)
Add me oh wait i cant play with you too high rank for you soz...
play ap braum, only way to carry
add me i will show u the way to legendary, pentakill janna{{champion:40}} {{item:3027}}
